column4: is there a way to see my cpu's temperature? hard drive's temperature?  mobo's temperature?  without having to boot into bios?  (ubuntu hardy)
yes, and much more... install screenlet, and Watermarek screenlets ( http://www.gnome-look.org/content/show.php?content=71960&forumpage=0 )
how do i get screenlet installed:  apt-get install screenlet didnt work
sudo apt-get install screenlets
then, extract Watermark in ~/.screenlets/
after, launch the screenlet manager in menu->preference. Launch several times Watermark to display several parameters (temperatures, cpu, fans, etc....)
i installed screenlets;  but dont know what you mean: <WalloO> arooni, then, extract Watermark in ~/.screenlets/ .... also what do you mean screenlets manager in menu preferences
download Watermark screenlet here: http://www.gnome-look.org/content/show.php?content=71960&forumpage=0 and install it in ~/.screenlets/ folder
ok so dont use the package version (sudo apt-get install)?
you need to install screenlets (sudo apt-get install screenlets ) to install the screenlets framwork. Watermark need screenlets to be installed
do i extract the entire screenlets thing to the .screenlets directory?
cuz i installed screenlets and i dont have a ~/.screenlets auto created; should id o that myself?
the Watermark screenlet package must be extracted (completely) in ~/.screenlets
create it
ok;  so it should look like :  ~/.screenlets/Watermark  ?
yes
ok done;  whats next ?

launch menu->preferences->Screenlets   to launch the screenlets manager. Then from there, launch watermark. Launch it several times to display several system parameters. As soon as you launch one, right click on it and go to properties to configure what you want it to display
got it;  whenever i launch though i see only cpu load
is there a way to quickly show/hide screenlets?
like a widget thing for osx

right click on the screenlet displayed on your desktop and chose "properties" Then you will be able to change what it displays. Install acpi, hddtemp, nvclock and lmsensors to have all system information available
